page.title: 18CHANDLER'S RIDGE SCHOOL
page.content: This school is a Primary School and takes children from 4 to 11. Lessons are mainly Maths, English, Art, Music and P.E. We have a choice of packed lunch, school dinners or going home. There are 3 dinner ladies and a few cooks. Children do duties such as ring the bell and give out registers. In Assembly, Tuesdays and Wednesdays we have a story, hymn, prayer and announcements. Thursday is a radio service and Friday a Hymn practice. We have 2 playgrounds, 6 classrooms, a staffroom, offices and teachers keep exercise books in one of 3 stock cupboards. School starts at 5 to 9 and finishes at half past 3 with 15 minutes playtime morning and afternoon. The nurse visits our school checking our hair, hearing and eyesight. She enjoys her work and visits three schools each day.
